text: I talk about the television. The television progress since several years, but since 21 century it evolution know a lot of progress. First, there are many of television channel, more and more programs about all of subject. The number of the viewer are also increase since the 20 century but internet substitue it in the mind of the population for several reasons. Even if the television knows a progress, some of program are censor and the information program are use by politics to control the "society". So, many of viewer use internet to pass through the censor and to have a free information.  I think a television are good tool if it not control by the big societies. It permit to watch a lot of program or movies. However, the television channel knows a censor according to if it was a propriety of private or public group. Example : the private group choose what he doesn't want to diffuse on his channel and can be censor what he wants. In this way if we don't know who have the channel, we don't know there are a form of censor on this channel and we can think this channel are nice. It's can be a problem also with the public channel, for the election for example, the group, the candidate who has more money for his campaign can be more at the television and he have more chance to become president because people see him more often. Indeed, the television with the publicity encourage people to buy and consume whereas the planet need than we are more responsable and we give a second life of the object, practice the hand-me down and stop ever buy.
